alert.note: Alert for Sabine (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 29 at 5:03PM CST until November 30 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR WEST CENTRAL SABINE PARISH IN NORTHWESTERN LOUISIANA AND NORTHWESTERN SABINE COUNTIES... At 502 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Milam, or 26 miles southeast of Center, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Milam around 510 PM CST. Zwolle around 535 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Negreet. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
